Reviews.Title: a m a z i n g!
Reviews.Author: Natalie-chan
Reviews.Content: This tv is beautifull! I had a few issues with it connecting the hd to my ps3 but after buying a hdmi cable it works crystal clear!

Reviews.Title: NO function
Reviews.Author: Carolle "knitter, medievalist"
Reviews.Content: We ordered this television, and it arrived non-functional.  We returned it, and received ANOTHER that didn't work.  No thanks.  This is sad because we already have TWO Sanyos in the house, and we love them.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo 720p DP32642
Reviews.Author: The One and Only
Reviews.Content: I own the Sanyo DP32642 and I love everything about it. It is very slim and lightweight so it doesn't weigh down my entertainment center. So far, I used it for my PS3, Blu-ray player, and PS4 and the picture looks sharp on all my HD devices, with 720p. It automatically adjusts the settings based on the light. The volume is great; I usually have it set to 20 (out of 63). Overall, I'd recommend it to others.This is my third Sanyo and I think I have become a loyalist of sorts. Amazing products from a quality brand!
